title: Harness after advancing checkpoint can fail to exit state 4

content.raw:
Steps:
  1.  Start a world (in this case, it's world 3)
  2.  Wait for the harness to go to 0 - works great.
  3.  Request task 3 / checkpoint 1
  4.  Harness messages comes on, goes to 4 - and ever exits condition 4

This may be related to the step size 2ms; I am using r689, with filtering and step_size_2ms applied.  I also have the most recent val-gazebo installed.  I believe I have seen it without that branch, but it is quite consistent with that branch.

I will try to reproduce this on the default branch (with filtering :-/).
